我国对外签订避免双重征税协定一览表 ... 丹麦 DENMARK 地区 Region 香港特别行政区 HKSAR.

entry.def: A region is  a large area of land that is different from other areas of land, for example because it is one of the different parts of a country with its own customs and characteristics, or because it has a particular geographical feature.

example.ex: ...Barcelona, capital of the autonomous region of Catalonia.
example.tran: 加泰罗尼亚自治区首府巴塞罗那

entry.def: The regions are the parts of a country that are not the capital city and its surrounding area.

example.ex: Tax incentives would be used to attract firms to the regions, away from the South-East.
example.tran: 将采取税收优惠政策把公司吸引到东南部以外的各地区。

entry.def: You can refer to a part of your body as a region.
You say in the region of to indicate that an amount that you are stating is approximate.

example.ex: The scheme will cost in the region of six million pounds.
example.tran: 这个计划将耗资大约600万英镑。

Sentence.sentence: a political scientist at the University of Colorado, Boulder, who studies disaster trends, said the Forum's report was "a methodological embarrassment" because there was no way to distinguish deaths or economic losses related to human-driven global warming amid the much larger losses resulting from the growth in populations and economic development in vulnerable (易受伤害的) regions.
